_source.text: 5 - Citizen Smith - written by the late John Sullivan who would years later perfect the sitcom with Only Fools and Horses, this starred Robert Lindsey who these days is better known for his part in  the inexplicably popular, My Family.

text: 5 - Citizen Smith - written by the late **John** **Sullivan** who would years later perfect the sitcom with
Only Fools and Horses, this starred Robert Lindsey who these days **is** **better** known for his part in  the inexplicably popular, My Family.
